snippet.title: Featured Community Vid: MWLL Action Pack
snippet.description:
Mixing MW4: Vengeance's OST with MWLL brawls, Orillious Tyr has created a trailer that really captures the epicness and energy of MWLL!


Mirrored with permission.

If you liked this video please give the original a watch and like as well, at https://youtu.be/7H5vXNGuHGo, and subscribe to Orillious Tyr for more similar content at https://www.youtube.com/@OrilliousTyr.
Music used is MW4 Vengeance OST's Action Pack - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QPUWMy9JQZA&t=0s


MechWarrior: Living Legends is an award-winning fan-made total conversion mod for first-person shooter game Crysis Wars. Released in 2009, MWLL features a unique combined-arms experience unlike any MechWarrior game before it or after. Following its successful development revival effort in late 2016, MWLL has since become a stand-alone mod - meaning you don't need to own Crysis Wars to play anymore!

Main site: https://mechlivinglegends.net/
Join our Discord community at https://discord.gg/QymgXdp
Check us out on ModDB, as well, at https://www.moddb.com/mods/mechwarrior-living-legends
